subject: Baseball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Manager Joe Girardi and the co-chairman Hal Steinbrenner lent their support Monday to Joba Chamberlain, who was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence.
snippet: Manager Joe Girardi and the co-chairman Hal Steinbrenner lent their support Monday to Joba Chamberlain, who was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence.
